description:
Learn Microsoft Excel Tips, Tricks and Hacks that I have learned over the past 12 years using Microsoft Excel.

Become the superstar at your organization and impress your colleagues and managers.

I used these Excel tips and tricks to propel myself into the Microsoft Excel expert at my work. This prestige created confidence in my work with my supervisors and lead to increasing roles within the organization.

On top of being known as the Excel expert, you will gain efficiencies that save you time. The more efficient you are with Excel the less time you need to spend using Excel. This means you can spend more time on the truly important parts to climb the corporate ladder.

The course contains over 1 hour and 45 minutes of valuable Microsoft Excel content. You will learn about Paste Special, Keyboard Shortcuts, Formatting, Re-sizing, and so much more.

The course is structured into 5 sections. Each section can be done on its own at your own pace. There is no order to the sections so you can start at any point and you won't be lost.

You should take this course to improve your Microsoft Excel skills. The Tips, Tricks & Hacks will take your Microsoft Excel skills to the next level.
title: Excel at Excel - Excel Tips, Excel Tricks, Excel Hacks
